name: Touhou Paper Partners
description:
Join Youmu and Reisen on the journey to obtain some fat cash to buy each other some matching rings! Travel around Misty Lake, beat up the local inhabitants, get fat cash, and experience our execution on a Paper Mario-styled game within a month's time adapted to the world of Touhou!

Controls: Recommend controller

Movement/Menus - arrow keys / Xbox controller left stick
Confirm/Block - z / Xbox controller "A"
Cancel/Parry - x / Xbox controller "B"
Switch Partners - left shift / Xbox controller "X"
Toggle Overworld HUD - spacebar / Xbox controller "Y"

How to battle:

Choose one of five options consisting of normal attacks, special attacks, defend, items, and run.

Normal/Special attacks: require you to perform a quick time event, upon failing, less or no damage will be dealt, special attacks will deal more damage but will cost [P].

Defend: Deals no damage, but the defending character will recieve reduced damage this turn.
Items: Use an item to heal, regenerate [P] or recover a downed character.
Run: Flees battle.

During enemy's attacks, you can time a block with "z" key or "A" on the controller to take reduced damage.

If you're feeling confident, you can time a parry with "x" key or "B" on the controller to negate damage and damage the attacking enemy instead.

Note: Parrying will have a shorter window compared to blocking.
